projects.name: Data Analyst AI Agent
projects.description: Built AI agent for dynamic data analysis and Q&A across CSV, Excel, Text, PDF, Image, and Audio. Automated visualizations using Matplotlib and Seaborn in Jupyter Notebook backend. Structured reusable code enabling scalable AI-driven analytics pipelines.

projects.name: Crypto Trading Bot
projects.description: Developed Python CLI bot supporting mock market, limit, and stop-limit orders. Implemented input validation and systematic logging of all transactions and errors. Simulated trading for BTC, ETH, BNB, ADA, and SOL using USDT-M Futures. Organized code for modularity and future expansion of order types.

projects.name: PDF Processing Tool
projects.description: Extracted structured outlines from PDFs for Adobe Connect The Dots Hackathon 2025. Dockerized solution for reproducible execution in isolated CPU-only environment (<16GB RAM).
